import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './AboutMe.css'; // Custom CSS for additional styling const AboutMe = () => { return (

About Me

{/* Left: Picture */} {/* Right: Text Block */}

Introduction

I am a passionate developer with experience in JavaScript, React, and full-stack development. I love creating user-friendly applications and exploring new technologies.

Education

I graduated with a degree in Computer Science from XYZ University. My coursework focused on web development, data structures, and algorithms.

{/* Continuation: Text below the image */}

Experience

During my journey, I have worked on various projects, ranging from small tasks to large e-commerce platforms. This includes developing secure payment integrations, building RESTful APIs, and creating responsive UI designs.

Goals

My mission is to collaborate on impactful projects and contribute to the tech community. I aim to continuously learn and grow as a developer.

); }; export default AboutMe;
